testcase.name: TechShop - Home Page › should load the home page with correct title
TechShop - Home Page › should display hero section with call to action
TechShop - Home Page › should display 20 products on home page
TechShop - Home Page › should show product details correctly
TechShop - Home Page › should display featured and new badges
TechShop - Search Functionality › should filter products based on search query
TechShop - Search Functionality › should show "no results" message for non-existent product
TechShop - Search Functionality › should clear search and show all products
TechShop - Shopping Cart › should add product to cart and update cart count
TechShop - Shopping Cart › should navigate to cart page and display added items
TechShop - Shopping Cart › should increment and decrement product quantity
TechShop - Shopping Cart › should remove product from cart
TechShop - Shopping Cart › should calculate cart total correctly
TechShop - Checkout Process › should navigate to checkout page from cart
TechShop - Checkout Process › should select delivery method
TechShop - Checkout Process › should validate required fields before placing order
TechShop - Checkout Process › should complete checkout and show confirmation
TechShop - Checkout Process › should clear cart after successful order
TechShop - Theme Toggle › should toggle between light and dark mode
TechShop - Navigation › should navigate between pages
TechShop - Navigation › should scroll to products when clicking Explore Collection
